post:
Let's not beat around the bush! There are PLENTY of CHEAP hosting offers out there for Dedicated servers - but at the end of the day, the age old saying is 100% true You Get What You Pay For!

Our services are not the cheapest, but they are also not the most expensive. We are competitively priced and our service levels are unrivaled. Give us a try.

Our servers are delivered FAST. In most cases if ordered before noon CST, the same day. Unlike other companies, we don't charge extra for the luxury of delivering hardware quicker, we do it as standard.

Hosting in Houston is a leading provider of high quality web hosting services. We specialize in the Houston, Texas market. Our servers are wholly owned by us and located in the Level3 Gateway datacenter in Houston. With a huge 20Gbps combined uplink by Cogent and Level3, we have unrivaled bandwidth and network performance.

Datacenter Tour

Special Offer Coupon Code:
25% Recurring Off each Month: HD25

* Discounts valid on Dedicated & Cloud Plans

Dedicated Servers:
Our hardware is world class enterprise grade. Unlike other proviers, we use quality components in our servers that will last. All our servers are built to order NEVER RECYCLED. Experience the ultimate in service and support with a Dedicated Server from Hosting in Houston.

Cloud Plans:
Our Cloud technology utilizes Xen and OnAPP for maximum performance. We have a HUGE SSD SAN with RAID protection ready to serve your data FAST. We just upgraded our infrastructure with NEW hypervisors and optimized our Cloud Network for maximum speed.
